results.title: Clinical, electrocardiographic, and diagnostic imaging features and outcomes in cats with electrocardiographic diagnosis of ventricular pre-excitation: a retrospective study of 23 cases (2010-2022).
results.text_hl: Common presenting signs included @DISEASE_Pulmonary_Atelectasis @DISEASE_MESH:D001261 @@@collapse@@@ (15/23; 65.2%) and @<m>DISEASE_Respiratory_Distress_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012128 @@@respiratory distress@@@ (14/23; 60.8%).

citations.NLM: Gavic EA, Stauthammer CD, Masters AK, Morgan KRS, Rendahl A, Ciccozzi M, Beekmann K, George R, Herrold E, Markovic LE, Schober K, Tjostheim SS, Wright K. Clinical, electrocardiographic, and diagnostic imaging features and outcomes in cats with electrocardiographic diagnosis of ventricular pre-excitation: a retrospective study of 23 cases (2010-2022). J Vet Cardiol. 2024 Sep 20;56():97-109. PMID: 39423603

results.title: [Acute respiratory distress syndrome in a patient treated with atenolol].
results.text_hl: We report a case of @<m>DISEASE_Respiratory_Distress_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012128 @@@acute respiratory distress syndrome@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Respiratory_Distress_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012128 @@@RDS@@@) in a @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Tenormin@@@) for two months.

citations.NLM: Guilaumé B, Moualla M, Bugnon D, Clémenti E, Berruchon J. [Acute respiratory distress syndrome in a patient treated with atenolol]. Rev Mal Respir. 1998 Sep;15(4):541-3. PMID: 9805766

results.title: Effectiveness of atenolol in the treatment of hypertension during pregnancy.
results.text_hl: Effectiveness of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ in the treatment of @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ during pregnancy.

results.title: Amlodipine poisoning revisited: Acidosis, acute kidney injury and acute respiratory distress syndrome
results.text_hl: Although direct measurement of pulmonary venous pressure could not be done, the overall picture was strongly suggestive of @<m>DISEASE_Respiratory_Distress_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012128 @@@acute respiratory distress syndrome@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Respiratory_Distress_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012128 @@@ARDS@@@).

citations.NLM: Naha K, Suryanarayana J, Aziz RA, Shastry BA. Amlodipine poisoning revisited: Acidosis, acute kidney injury and acute respiratory distress syndrome Indian J Crit Care Med. 2014 Jul;18(7):467-9. PMID: 25097362
